creator: preeti_asai@yahoo.co.in
text:
I want to use POI for hwpf, in my software, but i am finding some errors of version for class WordExtractor, like version 48.0 is found , instead 45, 46 like that. 

Here we are using JDK 1.4 , so may be the compatibility is not thr, so please tell me, for JDK 1.4 version, which jar files to use for POI implementation.

Reply me as soon as possible.

Thanks.
Preeti Asai.

POI 3.1 and POI 3.2 work with jdk 1.4

POI 3.5 has two jars, one for jdk 1.4, and one for jdk 1.5
creator: apache@gagravarr.org
